wired-checkbox.description: Checkbox webcomponent with hand-drawn sketchy look

wired-radio-group.description: Allows user to select at most one radio button from a set. Works with wired-radio.

wired-item.description: wired-item is a list item used by Wired components like wired-combo and wired-list-box

wired-listbox.description: A listbox control with Wired hand-drawn styling. The selected item is highlighted. Can be vertical (default) or horizontal.

wired-progress.description: A progress indicator control with a hand-drawn wireframe look.

wired-input.description: A single-line text field with hand-drawn, wireframe like, look.

wired-textarea.description: A multi-line text field (auto-grows) with a hand-drawn, wireframe like, look

wired-card.description: wired-card is s a container for other web elements - with a hand-drawn, wireframe like, look.

wired-combo.description: Combobox control - similar to a native browser select element; with a hand-drawn, wireframe like, style.

wired-icon-button.description: This is a round button with an image placed at the center. Image could also be in icon, more specifically an icon as and iron-icon.

wired-menu-item.description: Menu item to be used with wired-menu-bar.

wired-menu-bar.description: A simple menu bar with hand drawn look and feel.

wired-slider.description: A sketchy slider which allows user to select a value from a range by moving the slider thumb

wired-tooltip.description: Tooltip with text that appears on hover over an element.

wired-spinner.description: A circular activity indicator with a sketchy hand-drawn look
